name: Lady in Waiting
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Count
description: The Count is worth +2 points if you also have the Countess in your score pile.

name: Countess
description: The Countess is worth +2 points if you also have the Count in your score pile.

name: Fast Noble
description: Collect an additional noble from the front of the line after you collect this noble.

name: Lady
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Lord
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Robespierre
description: The day ends after you collect this noble. Discard any nobles remaining in line.

name: Rival Executioner
description: Collect the top noble of the noble deck after you collect this noble.

name: Unpopular Judge
description: No player may play an action card while the Unpopular Judge is at the front of the line.

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Captain of the Guard
description: Add another noble from the noble deck to the end of the line after you collect this noble.

name: General
description: Add another noble from the noble deck to the end of the line after you collect this noble.

name: Master Spy
description: After each action card is played, move this card to the end of the line.

name: Tragic Figure
description: This noble is worth -1 point for every Gray noble in your score pile (including this one).

name: Innocent Victim
description: Choose an action card from your hand and discard it after you collect this noble.

name: The Clown
description: When you collect this noble, place it in another player's score pile.

name: After You...
description: Put the noble at the front of the line into another player's score pile.

name: Bribed Guards
description: Move the noble at the front of the line to the end of the line.

name: Callous Guards
description: Put this card in front of you. Action cards that alter the line may not be played. (This includes adding or discarding nobles.) You may discard this card at any time.

name: Church Support
description: Put this card in front of you. It is worth +1 point for each Blue noble in your score pile.

name: Civic Pride
description: Move a Green noble forward up to 2 places in line.

name: Civic Support
description: Play this card in front of you. It is worth +1 point for each Green noble in your score pile.

name: Clerical Error
description: Choose a player. Collect any noble of your choice from the player's score pile. That player then chooses any other noble from your score pile and collects it.

name: Clothing Swap
description: Choose any noble in line and discard it. Replace it with the top noble from the noble deck.

name: Confusion in Line
description: Choose a player. Randomly rearrange the line just before that player collects his or her next noble.

name: Double Feature
description: Collect an additional noble from the front of the line this turn.

name: Escape!
description: Randomly choose 2 nobles in line and discard them. Randomly rearrange the remaining nobles in line.

name: Extra Cart
description: Add 3 nobles from the noble deck to the end of the line.

name: Fainting Spell
description: Move a noble backward up to 3 places in line.

name: Fled to England
description: Discard any noble in line.

name: Forced Break
description: All other players must discard an action card at random.

name: Foreign Support
description: Put this card in front of you. Draw an action card whenever you collect a Purple noble.

name: Forward March
description: Move a Palace Guard to the front of the line.

name: Fountain of Blood
description: Put this card in front of you. It is worth 2 points.

name: Friend of the Queen
description: Move a noble backward up to 2 places in line.

name: Ignoble Noble
description: Move a noble forward exactly 4 places in line.

name: Indifferent Public
description: Put this card in front of you. Any Gray nobles in your score pile are worth 1 point instead of their normal values.

name: Infighting
description: Choose a player. That player must choose 2 action cards from his or her hand and discard them.

name: Information Exchange
description: Trade hands with another player.

name: Lack of Faith
description: If there are any Blue nobles in line, move the one nearest the front of the line to the front of the line.

name: Lack of Support
description: Choose a player. Look at that player's hand, choose an action card, and discard it.

name: Late Arrival
description: Look at the top 3 cards of the noble deck and add any one of them to the end of the line.

name: Let Them Eat Cake
description: If Marie Antoinette is in line, move her to the front of the line.

name: L'Idiot
description: Move a noble forward up to 2 places in line.

name: Majesty
description: Move a Purple noble forward up to 2 places in line.

name: Mass Confusion
description: Put all nobles in line in the noble deck. Shuffle the noble deck and deal out the same number of nobles in a new line.

name: Military Might
description: Move a Red noble forward up to 2 places in line.

name: Military Support
description: Put this card in front of you. It is worth +1 point for each Red noble in your score pile.

name: Milling in Line
description: Randomly rearrange the first 5 nobles in line.

name: Missed!
description: Choose a player. That player must place the last noble he or she collected at the end of the line.

name: Missing Heads
description: Choose a player. That player loses a random noble from his or her score pile.

name: Opinionated Guards
description: Rearrange the first 4 nobles in line any way you wish.

name: Political Influence
description: Draw 3 additional action cards at the end of your turn. Do not collect a noble this turn.

name: Public Demand
description: Move any noble in line to the front of the line.

name: Pushed
description: Move a noble forward exactly 2 places in line.

name: Rain Delay
description: Shuffle all players' hands into the action deck and deal out 5 new action cards to each player.

name: Rat Break
description: Put an action card of your choice from the discard pile into your hand.

name: Rush Job
description: Choose a player. That player cannot play an action card on his or her next turn.

name: Scarlet Pimpernel
description: The day ends after you finish your turn. Discard any nobles remaining in line.

name: Stumble
description: Move a noble forward exactly 1 place in line.

name: The Long Walk
description: Reverse the order of the line.

name: 'Tis a Far Better Thing
description: Move a noble forward exactly 3 places in line.

name: Tough Crowd
description: Put this card in front of another player. It is worth -2 points to that player.

name: Trip
description: Move a noble backward exactly 1 place in line. You may play another action card this turn.

name: Twist of Fate
description: Put any action card in front of any player into the discard pile

name: Was That My Name?
description: Move a noble forward up to 3 places in line.
